Tolkien-related events that took place in 2022.

content.title: January
content.content:
3 - Birthday Toast.
20 - The official title of The Lord of the Rings television series is announced.

content.title: February
content.content:
13 - The first official trailer of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is released online.
28 - Priscilla Tolkien dies.
? - Amon Hen 293 is published.

content.title: March
content.content:
17 - Amazon completes the acquisition of MGM.
22 - The second edition of The One Ring™ RPG is officially released.
25 - Tolkien Reading Day.

content.title: May
content.content: 14 - Middle-earth Strategy Battle Game: Defence of the North is released.

content.title: June
content.content: 24 - The Great Tales Never End: Essays in Memory of Christopher Tolkien is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
14 - The second official teaser trailer of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is released.
28 - Actor Bernard Cribbins dies.
31 -The Chronology of The Lord of the Rings is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
9 - Tolkien Calendar 2023 is published.
19 - The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power (Season One: Amazon Original Series Soundtrack) is released online.
23 - The third and final trailer of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is released online.
? - Embracer Group enters into an agreement to buy Middle-earth Enterprises from the Saul Zaentz Company.

content.title: September
content.content:
1 - 4 - Oxonmoot 2022 is held online at St Anne's College, Oxford.
1 - Episode one, "A Shadow of the Past", and episode two, "Adrift", of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power are simultaneously released online.
1 - A new and revised edition of The Complete Guide to Middle-earth by Robert Foster is published.
9 - The episode "Adar" of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is released online.
16 - The episode "The Great Wave" of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is released online.
23 - The episode "Partings" of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is released online.
30 - The episode "Udûn" of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is released online.

content.title: October
content.content:
3 - Production for the second season of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power series begins in the United Kingdom.
7 - The episode "The Eye" of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is released online.
14 - The episode "Alloyed" of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is released online.
25 - American animator Jules Bass dies.

content.title: November
content.content:
15 - The Fall of Númenor is published.
15 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Before the Shadow is released online.

content.title: December
content.content:
14 - Most of the production team of the second season of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is revealed.[1]
? - Mallorn 63 is published.
